items.title: Principles of Actuarial Modelling
items.headline: By MJ the Fellow Actuary
objectives_summary: We will discuss what a model is and why actuaries make them. We will look at their components and discuss their limitations. We will also compare the stochastic model to the deterministic model and determine how to choose between them. We will also consider stress testing, scenario analysis and sensitivity testing before looking at Time Horizons and communication.

items.title: Black belt mindset -

visible_instructors.name: Shai
visible_instructors.title: Shai Gold
visible_instructors.job_title: Personal financial coach - I'm doubling your personal equity

items.headline: Develop the mindset of a champion
objectives_summary: Black Belt Mindset, this is a course that will help my students develop a strong belief in themselves, the goal of this course is to make you develop a strong awareness state where no matter what challenge you face.

This course will help you understand why it is important to have a strong physical and mental life and how it directly affects the accumulation of financial capital. In the course, I will also talk about why it is important to sacrifice to achieve your goals and your dreams.
